content.body:
is the "port message queue" task source a *unique* task source, like the HTMLMediaElement, which says:

> Each media element has a *unique* media element event task source.

Just trying to  read through and understand the implications of that task queue at the moment
content.formatted_body:
is the "port message queue" task source a unique task source, like the HTMLMediaElement, which says:

Each media element has a unique media element event task source.

Just trying to read through and understand the implications of that task queue at the moment

content.body: Shannon Booth: it's one per MessagePort as I read it; we should make the language consistent though.
content.formatted_body: Shannon Booth: it's one per MessagePort as I read it; we should make the language consistent though.

content.body: As a non-native speaker it always bugs me when a lot of different words are used to describe the same thing. I can understand it for non-normative content to give people some additional ways to grasp the concepts, but for normative content it just makes matters too confusing.
yeah, I was trying to figure out if there was a subtle difference in some way, but it sounds like it means the same thing!
